This App is a user-friendly mobile application that streamlines the process of finding recipes. Simply input the name of a recipe, and the app, powered by the Spoonacular API, retrieves a list of corresponding recipes. You can browse through the results, view detailed information, save your favorite recipes to a local database for easy access later. The app also remembers your search term for a seamless user experience.
